duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the Synchronised Supply Chain Program Team for the Global Operations Network.
Develop and deploy Global Supply Network Planning (SNP) process standards and metrics.
Report into the Program Steering Committee and collaborate with Global Operations cross-functions.
Ensure end-to-end supply chain transformation goals for the AZ Enterprise are delivered.
Facilitate communication of Transformation program remit, scope, charter, and program landmarks to Senior Operations Leaders, SLT, Regional SC leadership & Commercial customers.
Oversee development and implementation of Planning business systems such as digital/concurrent planning roadmap.
Plan and implement Planning parameter data standards & system solutions.
Coach and develop a global program team of 10 resources including PMO, Change & Communications, Process/Data/Analytics, and supporting functions.
Work with HR community at Global & Site levels to ensure role definitions, skill matrix, and competency maps for new roles are aligned.
Hold accountability for Program budget & PMO delivery achievements.
Ensure core alignments across E2E Supply Chain Process value realization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
